List.Name: Clock selection
List.Tooltip: Configured the clock during STiROT execution depending on the voltage supply level and the range of temperature supported

Bool.Name: SRAM ECC management activation
Bool.Tooltip: If selected, ECC (Error Code Correction) will be managed. ECC is a mechanism to prevent mechanisms prevent external attacks.

Data.Name: Firmware area address (in internal RAM)
Data.Tooltip: Enter the address of the area where the firmware is verified then executed in internal RAM (located in AXI SRAM and aligned on 16 KB)

Data.Name: Firmware area size
Data.Tooltip: Enter the size of the firmware areas (aligned on 8 Kbytes)

List.Name: Product state minimal allowed
List.Tooltip: After checking its authenticity and integrity STiROT will execute the firmware only if the product state programmed in option byte is at equal or greater than the "Product state minimal allowed"

Data.Name: Firmware installation area address (in external flash)
Data.Tooltip: Enter the address of the area where the firmware is installed in external flash (aligned on 64 Kbytes, depending on slot's size of the external flash). If the Firmware size is not aligned on 64 Kbytes, keep the sector end empty

Data.Name: Firmware download area address (in external flash)
Data.Tooltip: Enter the address of the area where the firmware is downloaded in external flash (aligned on 64 Kbytes, depending on slot's size of the external flash). If the Firmware size is not aligned on 64 Kbytes, keep the sector end empty

Data.Name: External non-volatile memory size
Data.Tooltip: Enter the size of the external non-volatile memory

List.Name: STiROT_iLoader offset
List.Tooltip: Select the STiROT_iLoader offset in flash memory

Data.Name: STiROT_iLoader size
Data.Tooltip: Enter the STiROT_iLoader size (aligned on flash sector size)

File.Name: Encryption key
File.Tooltip: Select the key used to encrypt firmware. When this key is regenerated, the firmware image must be processed with Imgtool

File.Name: Authentication key
File.Tooltip: Select the key used to authenticate firmware. When this key is regenerated, the firmware image must be processed with Imgtool

Output.Name: Output File
Output.Tooltip: Select the output file .obk including STiROT configuration
